title: Mushaf Ayat
description: A Platform Providing Manuscripts of Famous Mushafs from the Islamic World
six_manuscripts: Six manuscripts of the Holy Qur'an in one application
app_desc: The first application in the Islamic world that combines characteristics and adventages that meet the needs of Muslims in terms of reading, memorizing, reviewing, interpreting, contemplating and listening
tafseer_desc: Interpretation of each verse by a group of interpretations
lesten_ser_desc: Your favorite reader among a number of readers
memorize_ser_desc: Repeating the verse or surah with the choice of the reciter
review_ser_desc: Verses and words appear as desired, then disappear to focus
indexing_desc: An index of surah names, page numbers, parts and parties
copy_desc: Copying a verse or verses with or without diacritics
share_desc: Share a verse or verses with or without formation
search_desc: An accurate search to search for a letter, word or phrase
dark_mode_desc: Night mode for visual comfort during the dark
reading_desc: Finding different novels according to frequent readings
copy_rights: All rights reserved to Ayat Charity Association 1446 - 2024
